article_title: India Seeks to Weaken Central Bank’s Power
article_text:
MUMBAI—India’s Ministry of Finance released late Thursday a draft regulation aimed at revamping decision-making processes at the country’s central bank, as the two institutions negotiate changes in the way the Reserve Bank of India sets monetary policy.

In a draft of the Indian Financial Code circulated for public discussion, the finance ministry proposed the setting up of a seven-member Monetary Policy Committee, a body that would...
